005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.math.BigInteger;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021
022public class IntegerAdapter
023    extends AbstractIntegerAdapter<IIntegerItem> {
024  @NonNull
025  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
026      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "integer")));
027
028  IntegerAdapter() {
029    // avoid general construction
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  public List<QName> getNames() {
034    return NAMES;
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  @NonNull
039  public Class<IIntegerItem> getItemClass() {
040    return IIntegerItem.class;
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public IIntegerItem newItem(Object value) {
045    BigInteger item = toValue(value);
046    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(item);
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  protected IIntegerItem castInternal(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
051    IIntegerItem retval;
052    if (item instanceof INumericItem) {
053      retval = newItem(((INumericItem) item).asInteger());
054    } else if (item instanceof IBooleanItem) {
055      boolean value = ((IBooleanItem) item).toBoolean();
056      retval = newItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(value ? BigInteger.ONE : BigInteger.ZERO));
057    } else {
058      retval = super.castInternal(item);
059    }
060    return retval;
061  }
062}
